adviseScripts.text: Client.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Do you invest in stocks?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I'm investing long-term in Missilis.
Are there any good stocks to invest in?
Oh. I'm surprised.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I thought you disliked Syuen too much to invest in Missilis.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Well, I admire you for separating business from personal matters.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Of course.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Allow me to recommend a company that will collaborate with us to launch a new product by the end of this month.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: The product isn't bad. I expect the stock price to skyrocket in the next few weeks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Now's your chance to get in on the ground level...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I talk business with Dolla.
Client.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: [The end justifies the means.] What do you think of this saying?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I agree.
I can't agree.
Haha.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Indeed, it's true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: If the result is good, who cares about the process?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Haha! Well said, Client. I expected you to answer something like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Though, my personal point of view does differ substantially from yours...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I spend a meaningful time with Dolla.
Sometimes, I'm not so sure about my colleagues in the squad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Rupee is completely stupid, and Yan is pretty annoying.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Yet you still trust them.
You should be nicer to them, since you guys are working together.
... How odd.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: You're kinda slow but you always see right through me, Client.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: For the last time...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: We do not 'work together.' We simply have a business relationship.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Dolla's banter and give some advice.
Client, I want to ask you something...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: What's your ideal type?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Someone with ambition...
Why you would ask such an odd question?
Are you... are you just messing with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Isn't it obvious?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I want to introduce someone special to you, Client.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I have an awkward conversation with Dolla about my ideal type.
... Client, I'm going to ask you something, but keep in mind that it's merely a question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever broken the law?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Nope. I'm innocent.
Hasn't everyone?
Haha. Just as I thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: A truly Client-like answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: It seems you and I have more in common than I thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time with Dolla.
An odd question just occurred to me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: What will I be in 10 years?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: The CEO of a monopoly.
The leader of a charity organization.
... What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: You really think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Oh my. My heart is pounding right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: ... Seriously?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I know, you just wanted me to change my mind, but what you said has the opposite effect.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I'll be a selfish, money-grubbing capitalist to the end.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I discuss Dolla's future with her.
I've always wanted to know...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: How can people be content with the things they already have?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: They find meaning in something other than possessions.
What good is feeling satisfied, anyway?
I acknowledge that this is good advice...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: But, no matter what I do, it just doesn't work for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: ... Yeah, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Sorry. I knew the answer, and yet I still asked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I just need to hear those words right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time with Dolla.
I've been working nonstop recently so I decided to take on vacation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Any places you recommend?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: The Commander's Room.
The hot springs.
You think there is anything helpful for relaxation beside the air conditioner?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Haha. Not a bad idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Especially if I had someone to go with me and keep me safe...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I talk to Dolla about vacation plans.
Is there any kind of gadget you've been wanting lately?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Ah. Don't get me wrong. Just asking for market research.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: A smartwatch for everyday wear.
A cutting-edge computer.
Oh, you mean the kind that monitors your health and fitness?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Seems like you enjoy taking care of yourself, Client.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... The computer in the Commander's Room is outdated?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Ah. Are you going to get a gaming rig? I've seen you hang out with Exia more often these days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Either way, thanks. That's very helpful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I help Dolla with her market research.
*Sigh*
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: What's wrong?
Did something go wrong with a transaction?
Ah. It's nothing you can help me with, Client.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: ... But thank you for asking, anyway.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Yeah... One of our suppliers got delayed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: This could jeopardize one of our biggest deals.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: So, I've been thinking. How should I teach these bastards a lesson?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I spend some quiet time with Dolla, who seems anxious.
This question just popped up in my head all of a sudden.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Tell me, how does it feel to never have the upper hand in any relationship you have with others?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I consider it an investment that could potentially pay off big down the line.
I'm willing to tolerate it if it's for the sake of my friends and squadmates.
I'm not so convinced the payout will be as big as you think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Despite that, I somewhat understand where you're coming from. It's hard for me to relate to it however
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: So are your friends going to support you financially when you get old and decrepit?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Dolla and I have a conversation about life.
There are some beautiful views in the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Especially when you're looking down on the city from a skyscraper in the city center.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: If you want, you could come to my office someday and we can look at it together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: You're not going to make me work overtime or anything, are you?
Anytime.
A romantic, you most surely are not...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: but you are pretty sharp.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Perfect. Come to the roof of the New Wave building one of these evenings.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: While we're at it, you could help me with some unfinished tasks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: The view may be spectacular, but we still have work to do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I made a promise to work late with Dolla.
When the competition has a leg up on you,
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: does it stress you out? Or do you just ignore it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I don't let it faze me.
It lights a fire underneath me.
Oh, I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Nothing wrong with going at your own pace.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: That's one thing you and I see eye-to-eye on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Cutthroat competition is a blessing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: That way, you feel even more alive when you eventually come out on top.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Dolla and I have a conversation about values.
You work under Deputy Chief Andersen, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: You don't know what he's into by any chance, do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Why? Do you need something from him?
Why? Are you interested in him?
... Fine. I suppose I don't have to hide anything from you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: It's nothing much, but there's a business opportunity I would like him to invest in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: But I can't go about it in any old way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Of course I am.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: He'd make a fine business partner.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Dolla and I talk more about how to give off signals.
Do you like going for a drive?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: If you were to go with me, where would you go?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: To the Outpost.
To Royal Road.
On purpose? During your free time? In a sports car?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: ... Why on earth would you go there?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: That's absurd. If this was an interview, I'd be showing you the door.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: A safe choice if there ever was one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Very well then. I'll come to pick you up once I'm done with everything over here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I spoke with Dolla and gave suggestions about where we could go for a drive.
Hypothetically speaking, let's say there's a business that's raking in a massive profit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: But there is someone interfering with the business.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: If this person were to say... disappear, everything would be peachy keen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: What would you do? Hypothetically.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Do what has to be done.
I'd convince them to get with the program.
That's what I thought too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: But it's more easily said than done.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: If I thought they could be convinced, I wouldn't be here contemplating more drastic measures.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I suppose it's not a bad answer. You're just being honest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Dolla and I watched a documentary about an ancient group of assassins.
If you, hypothetically speaking, made a minor error...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: and ended up losing half of the money an investor gave you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: What kind of excuse would you use?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I'd go gambling and win back what I lost.
There's still half left, so I wouldn't lose my head.
If I were the investor, I'd string you up by your toes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Such confidence!
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: You're right. I still have half left.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: We're not in the red yet, so there's still a chance. I've got to make it happen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: As I spoke with Dolla, she gave me some investment tips.
I found the whereabouts of those who hacked my account.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: That little punk is barely 15.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: So I'm a little conflicted. What I should do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I just want to rough him up a bit...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: What he did was unforgivable.
He's young and stupid. He made a mistake.
Exactly! I can't let him get off scot-free.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: The sooner he learns it's a dog-eat-dog world out there, the better.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I don't care how young he is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: He committed a crime; a premeditated crime at that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I'll take what you said into consideration... but at the end of the day, I'll handle this my way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Dolla and I exchange views on juvenile crime.
I'm curious about how you handle your finances.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Would you rather save your money, or invest it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Save.
Invest.
So you like to play it safe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: But as they say...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: no risk, no reward.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Brilliant.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: No risk, no reward.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: How about we team up and make some investments together?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I listen as Dolla gives me a lecture about investment.
How much money do you think it takes before you're satisfied?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: You'll never be satisfied, no matter how much money you have.
It's all about making money, not how much of it you have.
You're probably right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: I'll probably never be satisfied at any point in my life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Client,
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: what are you on about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dolla

adviseScripts.text: Dolla and I talk about finding satisfaction in life.
